definition: bloody mouth wide open like a sacrificial bowl (idiom); ferocious mouth of beast of prey/fig. greedy exploiter/rapacious aggressor
basin/flower pot/unit of volume equal to 12 斗[dou3] and 8 升[sheng1], approx 128 liters/CL:個|个[ge4]
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.chinese: 龍的血盆大口分外顯眼，顯然是一隻兇險的野獸。

sentences.english: Give yourself a monstrous Moshi Monster mouth with this fabulous and fun app.
sentences.chinese: 該款應用可以讓你擁有一張怪獸的“血盆大口”。

sentences.english: Before him are a dozen steel animal traps with their jaws wide open.
sentences.chinese: 而前面等待他的是一大羣長着血盆大口的鋼鐵怪獸。

definition: to bare fangs and brandish claws (idiom); to make threatening gestures
bloody mouth (from devouring freshly killed prey)
big mouthful (of food, drink, smoke etc)/open mouth/gulping/gobbling/gaping
to charge/to pounce on/to swoop down on
